ticket_purchasing_tips.ways_to_save: Consider attending games on weekdays for potentially lower ticket prices. Explore group discounts or promotional nights for additional savings. Last-minute ticket deals can also offer savings.
ticket_purchasing_tips.avoiding_scalpers: Always buy tickets from official sources or reputable platforms to avoid scams. Be wary of deals that seem too good to be true and verify the authenticity of tickets when purchasing from secondary markets.
